MANDATE.SECTION_1: By signing this mandate form, you authorise Velocity Aachen GmbH to send instructions to your bank to debit your account and your bank to debit your account in accordance with the instructions from Velocity Aachen GmbH.
MANDATE.SECTION_2: As part of your rights, you are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with your bank. A refund must be claimend within 8 weeks starting from the date on which your account was debited.
MANDATE.SECTION_3: Your rights regarding this mandate are explained in a statement you can obtain from your bank.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Privacy Policy
SECTION_1.CONTENT: The protection of your privacy is important. At this point we would like to inform you about the privacy policy at Velocity Aachen GmbH. We apply high security standards in order to protect your data from unauthorized access. Surely, we follow the clauses of the Datenschutzgesetz (BDGS) as well as of the Telemediengesetz (TMG).

SECTION_2.HEADING: Personal Data
SECTION_2.CONTENT: It is necessary to gather and store personal data to meet the agreements in the contract between you and Velocity Aachen GmbH. We store name, gender, age and address to identify you as a customer internally. Furthermore, are you creating a password and a PIN and providing your email address. We are storing this data to be able to get in touch with you and because it is essential for using the bike sharing system. On demand, we will inform you in more detail about the personal data stored in our system.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Payment Service Provider
SECTION_3.CONTENT: Information about your bank account, the requested amount and the corresponding invoice ID are transmitted to our payment service provider for each settlement.

SECTION_4.HEADING: Trip Information
SECTION_4.CONTENT: Station information including a timestamp of the start and the end of each completed trip are stored. We need these information for the monthly settlement. Besides, by storing these information you can check your personal trip history online in our customer control panel. In case you find some discrepancies, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support.

SECTION_5.HEADING: Customer Control Panel
SECTION_5.CONTENT: We are using cookies in our customer control panel to enable authentication of customers at our service. That’s the only use case of cookies.
